url.description: The URL to access the project card.

project_url.description: The URL to access the project that includes the project card.

id.description: The unique identifier of the project card.

node_id.description: The unique Node ID of the project card.

note.description: Any notes associated with the project card.

archived.description: Indicates whether the project card is archived or not.

creator.description: The user who created the project card.

created_at.description: The date and time when the project card was created.

updated_at.description: The date and time when the project card was last updated.

column_url.description: The URL to access the project column associated with the project card.

content_url.description: The URL that provides direct access to the project card's content.

repository.description: The repository to which the project card is linked.

project_id.description: The unique identifier of the project to which the project card belongs.

column_id.description: The unique identifier of the project column that the project card belongs to.
